Content Management System

The foundation of VISUALPLANT is VP: Admin — an easy to use, powerful content management system to store, moderate, manipulate, distribute and monitor your media. You keep tabs on all your goods in one location and publish to as many venues as you choose.

Preview some of the tools:

Choose transcode formats
Drag and drop upload
Moderate user titles


Manage categories
Search/browse library
Manage site FAQs



Moderate user comments
Manage staff
Organize assets



Manage metadata
Manage credits
Build playlists



Report on viewership
Report on search
Manage Venues™
